identity.name: B-CON CONSULTING
identity.archetype: Swiss & High-Contrast mixed with The Performance Pro

rules.gradients: Use ONLY for small accents (borders, icons, buttons). NEVER full backgrounds.
rules.contrast: Ensure WCAG AA compliance. Use Slate-900 text on White. White text on Slate-900.

buttons.primary: bg-slate-900 text-white hover:bg-slate-800 rounded-none px-8 py-4 font-medium transition-all duration-300 hover:translate-x-1
buttons.secondary: border border-slate-200 text-slate-900 hover:border-slate-900 rounded-none px-8 py-4 transition-all duration-300
buttons.cta: bg-red-900 text-white hover:bg-red-800 rounded-none px-10 py-5 font-bold shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl transition-all

cards.service: bg-white p-8 border border-slate-100 hover:border-slate-300 transition-all duration-300 group relative overflow-hidden

inputs.style: rounded-none border-slate-200 focus:ring-slate-900 focus:border-slate-900 bg-white h-12

hero_bg.alt: Scaffolding against clear blue sky representing structure and growth
hero_bg.usage: Hero section background or split layout image

about_consulting.usage: About Us section or Services intro

large_scale_project.usage: Portfolio highlight or Case Study header

assets.icons: Use 'lucide-react' for UI icons (ChevronRight, Building, Ruler, FileText, HardHat, Users)

sections: Hero: Split layout. Left: Bold Typography + CTA. Right: Hero Image (Scaffolding).
Why Us: Asymmetric layout with 'Modern Infrastructure' image.
Stats/Trust: Simple row with numbers (Years, Projects, Value).

services.layout: Grid of 6 cards. Each card has a subtle hover effect revealing the gradient accent.

contact.layout: Two columns. Left: Contact Info (No address). Right: Shadcn Form.

instructions_to_main_agent: Use 'Manrope' for all Headings to give a technical, architectural feel.
Use 'Inter' for body text for maximum readability.
Implement 'lenis' for smooth scrolling to make the site feel premium.
Do NOT use rounded corners > 4px. Keep things sharp and structural (rounded-none or rounded-sm).
Use the Red/Blue gradient ONLY as a thin border or small accent, never as a main background.
Ensure all text is in Romanian as per the problem statement.
Use the provided image URLs strictly. Do not use placeholders.
For the 'Services' section, use a 'Bento' grid or a clean 3-column grid with generous whitespace.
The 'Contact' form must be functional (UI-wise) using Shadcn components.
universal_guidelines: Avoid generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs (p-12, p-24).
Interactive elements must have hover states (text color change, border reveal).
All interactive elements must have data-testid attributes.
